content: a fine doily from the victorian era first published in the ladies work-book in late 1800s materials brooks great exhibition prize goat s-head crochet cotton nos 10 20 22 24 26 28 30 and penelope crochet hook nos 3 3-1/2 4 > this pattern is also available **for free** here star pattern d oyley at knitheaven 1 1 http //www knitheaven com/vintagepatterns/crochet_pattern_doily htm#star_pattern_doily
